description: A unique archipelago made of mangrove trees whose roots have grown above the ocean. The island is located near the Red Line and serves as a checkpoint for pirates heading to the New World via Fish-Man Island.

keyEvents.title: Confrontation Between Real and Fake Luffy
keyEvents.description: The real Luffy encounters Demaro Black and the Fake Straw Hat Crew on the streets of Sabaody Archipelago.
keyEvents.significance: Location where Luffy demonstrates his post-timeskip Haki abilities for the first time.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Haki Demonstration
keyEvents.description: Luffy uses Observation and Conqueror's Haki to defeat the entire Fake Straw Hat Crew on Sabaody.
keyEvents.significance: First major demonstration of the Straw Hats' post-timeskip power levels at their reunion point.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Returns to Sabaody
keyEvents.description: Zoro's ship surfaces near Sabaody, cut in half after he boarded the wrong vessel.
keyEvents.significance: Shows another Straw Hat returning to Sabaody with enhanced abilities.

statusHistory.reason: Sabaody serves as the reunion point for the Straw Hat Pirates after the two-year timeskip

name.japanese: シャッキーのぼったくりBAR

description: A bar on Sabaody Archipelago owned by Shakuyaku (Shakky), located on Grove 13. It serves as a gathering point and information hub for the Straw Hat Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Gathers Information
keyEvents.description: Sanji visits Shakky's Rip-off Bar where he learns about the status and whereabouts of his returning crewmates.
keyEvents.significance: Serves as an information hub where Straw Hats learn about each other's return to Sabaody.

statusHistory.reason: The bar continues to operate and serve as a meeting point for the Straw Hats

description: Grove 46 on Sabaody Archipelago, where the Fake Straw Hat Crew was recruiting pirates and where Sentomaru deployed Pacifista units.

keyEvents.title: Fake Crew's Base of Operations
keyEvents.description: Grove 46 is revealed as the location where the Fake Straw Hat Crew was gathering recruits.
keyEvents.significance: The gathering point that attracts both fake crew recruits and Marine attention.

keyEvents.title: Marines Deploy to Grove 46
keyEvents.description: Sentomaru and Pacifista units PX-5 and PX-7 are deployed to Grove 46 to deal with the Fake Straw Hat Crew.
keyEvents.significance: Becomes a battleground between Marines and pirates.

statusHistory.reason: Grove 46 is an active area on Sabaody Archipelago
